Package org.webcurator.ui.admin.controller

Class Summary
AgencyController Manages the Agency Administration view and the actions associated with a Agency
AssociateUserRoleController Manage the view for associating Roles to a user.
ChangePasswordController Manage the view for changing a users password.
CreateRejReasonController Manages the creation flow for a Rejection Reason within WCT
CreateUserController Manages the creation flow for a User within WCT
RejReasonController Manages the Rejection Reason Administration view and the actions associated with a Rejection Reason
RoleController The Controller for creation and management of Roles within the WCT.
TemplateController The Controller for managing the creation and modification of permission templates.
UserController Manages the User Administration view and the actions associated with a User
